divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking pictures of my son playing in the snow and of the house, and when we came inside I put the pictures on my laptop. The attached anomaly showed up when I was reviewing the photos. In the marked area of the original photo you can't make out the anomaly at full size, but at 300% magnification you begin to see what is a distinct triangle silhouetted against the clouds with a dark squarish shape on the bottom. We never saw the object when we were outside, it only became apparent in the photo.The other photos contain no similar feature.
trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around January 30th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
